Title: Complete the basics at community college
Description:
Community college is a no-brainer. You’ll save on both tuition and housing costs — as long as you pick a community college close enough that you can live at home.

The two years you’ll spend here will be the most lax two years of your college experience. Take advantage of your free time!

Title: Get your Bachelor’s degree
Description: A Bachelor’s degree is table stakes for a career in ecology. It’s just enough to get your foot in the door at many research labs and institutes — without having to dish out for a graduate-level degree.
